column4: Guys, i really need some help.. my system keeps locking up and i have to reboot... anyway i can find out? i had my system lock up 4 times in 24 hours
you can try to tail your system logs in  /var/log.. see whats causing it
i see something like Aug 24 22:28:33 localhost -- MARK --
then check the log to see any error around the time your pc hung
you need to open the lg files using it:)
try opening syslog..it'd b more helpful
im lost... the last thing i reinstalled was the latest update
that's strange..what update did you install?
not too sure...the syslog will be helpful in trying to figure out the cause..you just have to go through the log
